ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No - this can t be the case, because I ve never met a Gnoll, but I have the language skill available. Talies on Bristlebane
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:32 AM 5/10/99 -0400, you wrote:
>
> It seems to me as I have met new races new languages appear ... perhaps ye
> need meet a dragon to trigger the languae skill.. I have hear that you need
> be higher skill than the one you teach to raise skill levels in language and
> it seems to at least improve the speed of learning the higher skill the
> teacher has. My Elder Erudian is now average ... so far none I have met are
> higher and all are poor at the old dark elf and lizardman ..
>
> Xzar of Xegony


No - this can't be the case, because I've never met a Gnoll, but I have the
language skill available.

Talies on Bristlebane
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
